name: Product Requirements Document
description: Define what you're building and why

fields.label: Feature Name
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Suggest a clear feature name that describes what's being built

fields.label: Problem Statement
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Describe the user problem or pain point this feature addresses

fields.label: Proposed Solution
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Describe the proposed solution based on the problem statement

fields.label: Target Users
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Identify the target user segment for this feature

fields.label: Success Metrics
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Suggest 3-5 quantifiable success metrics for this feature

fields.label: User Stories
fields.placeholder: As a [user], I want to [action], so that [benefit]
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Generate 3-5 user stories based on the problem and solution

fields.label: Acceptance Criteria
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Generate acceptance criteria to validate the solution works

fields.label: Dependencies & Risks
fields.placeholder: What depends on this? What could go wrong?
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Identify potential dependencies, blockers, and risks
